column1: * 1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien is 1957 "Carnival of Books" Interview by Ruth Harshaw for the NBC radio program "Carnival of Books".
* 1967 - Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien with J.R.R. Tolkien is published in The Sunday Times Magazine 15 January 1967 and in The New York Times Magazine 15 January 1967.
* 1972 - The Tolkien Society holds a general meeting and becomes formally constituted.
* 2005 - The second day of the first "The One Ring Celebration".
* 2015 - A Brief History of The Hobbit is published.
** The Fellowship of the Ring find the Chamber of Mazarbul and Balins Tomb. Gimli takes the Book of Mazarbul.
** Attack of the Orcs and the Balrogs. Gandalf destroys the Bridge of Khazad-dûm and falls with Durins Bane.
** The rest of the Fellowship of the Ring exits Moria and enters Dimrill Dale.

column2: Frodo Baggins and Samwise Gamgee gaze in Mirrormere.
Rúmil (elf of Lórien) and Orophin meet the Fellowship. They sleep on flets.
